attributes.action: Acknowledge that Scotland is now a foreign country now it has its own parliment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Their are approximately 60 Scotish mp`s in the English parliment trying to run our country.
In my opinion I think it is totally unfair as there are no English MP,s in the Scottish Parliment I will not vote for any of the parties again until it has been rectified.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
